org.gcn.plinguacore.parser

Interface IParsersClassProvider

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IParsersInfo

    public interface IParsersClassProvider
extends IParsersInfo
    An interface to represent the class name provider for AbstractParserFactory. It is intended to be used only by AbstractParserFactory, in order to hide the resources layer from the user.
    Author:
    Research Group on Natural Computing (http://www.gcn.us.es)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getInputFormatClassName(java.lang.String formatID)
      Gets the name of the InputParser subclass for the format
      java.lang.String getInputFormatClassNameThroughExtension(java.lang.String extension)
      Looks if there's any input format whose files correspond to the extension given and returns the name of the input format class which parses that format
      java.lang.String getOutputFormatClassName(java.lang.String formatID)
      Gets the name of the OutputParser subclass for the format

      • Methods inherited from interface org.gcn.plinguacore.parser.IParsersInfo

        getCommandLineOption, getCommandLineOptionsIterator, getFileExtension, getFileExtensionsIterator, getFormatByCommandLineOption, getFormatByExtension, getFormatsIterator, getInputFormatsIterator, getOutputFormatsIterator, hasCommandLineOption, hasFileExtension, hasFormat, hasInputFormat, hasInputRecognizedFormat, hasOutputFormat

    • Method Detail

      • getInputFormatClassName

        java.lang.String getInputFormatClassName(java.lang.String formatID)
                                         throws PlinguaCoreException
        Gets the name of the InputParser subclass for the format
        Parameters:
        formatID - the format which InputParser subclass name is required
        Returns:
        the name of the Parser class for a specific input format
        Throws:
        PlinguaCoreException - if the given format hasn't a IntputParser subclass

      • getOutputFormatClassName

        java.lang.String getOutputFormatClassName(java.lang.String formatID)
                                          throws PlinguaCoreException
        Gets the name of the OutputParser subclass for the format
        Parameters:
        formatID - the format which OutputParser subclass name is required
        Returns:
        the name of the Parser class for a specific output format
        Throws:
        PlinguaCoreException - if the given format hasn't a OutputParser subclass

      • getInputFormatClassNameThroughExtension

        java.lang.String getInputFormatClassNameThroughExtension(java.lang.String extension)
                                                         throws PlinguaCoreException
        Looks if there's any input format whose files correspond to the extension given and returns the name of the input format class which parses that format
        Parameters:
        extension - the extension which input format class name should be returned
        Returns:
        the input format class name which corresponds to the file extension given
        Throws:
        PlinguaCoreException - if there's no recognized input parser for the extension given
